name: HeartRateMeasurementBodyLocationReferenceSet
title: Heart rate measurement body location reference set
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Heart rate measurement body location value set as defined by the Clinical Information Modeling Initiative.),(Data Element Scope: This reference set contains values used to result the body location where a heart rate was measured, referencing the LOINC term "Heart rate measurement site", 41904-4, resulting the SNOMED CT concept: Heart rate measurement body location reference set (foundation metadata concept) 23871000205104.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set is missing 2 concepts from the HSPC extension namespace: Structure of left superficial temporal artery (body structure) 24781000205105; Structure of right superficial temporal artery (body structure) 24791000205107.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
